Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: LKM Hive to Pig AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION This KM loads data from a hive table into Pig using HCatalog.
REQUIREMENTS - The source hive table must exist in HCatalog - The property 'hive.metastore.uris' pointing to Hive Metastore is defined for Pig Server
OPTIONS - Storage Function: The storage function to be used to load data from hive table.
LIMITATIONS - Complex data types are not supported. - Refer HCatalog documentation for additional limitations on HCatLoader.
The storage function to be used to load data from hive table.
HCatLoader is used to load data from a hive table
The pig schema for simple/complex fields separated by comma (,)

Redefine the datatypes of the fields in pig schema format. This option primarily allows to overwrite the default datatypes conversion for data store attributes, for example: PO_NO:int,PO_TOTAL:long MOVIE_RATING:{(RATING:double,INFO:chararray)} where the names of the fields defined here should match with the attributes names of the datastore.
